v-model:active.description: Whether to activate the action menu

show.description: Whether or not to display triggers

direction.description: The action menu pops up the direction, and the optional values are 'top', 'bottom', 'left' right
direction.description_zh: 动作菜单弹出方向，可选值为 `top` `bottom` `left` right

inactive-icon-size.description: Trigger icon size when not activated
inactive-icon-size.description_zh: 未激活时触发器图标尺寸

active-icon-size.description_zh: 激活时触发器图标尺寸

fixed.description: Whether to use fixed positioning, set to 'false' to enable absolute positioning
fixed.description_zh: 是否使用固定定位，设置为 `false` 可开启绝对定位

z-index.description: Same as CSS z-index, which is used to customize the trigger hierarchy
z-index.description_zh: 同 css z-index，用于自定义触发器层级

top.description: Same as CSS TOP, which is used to customize the trigger position
top.description_zh: 同 css top，用于自定义触发器位置

bottom.description: Same as CSS bottom, which is used to customize the trigger position
bottom.description_zh: 同 css bottom，用于自定义触发器位置

left.description: Same as CSS left, which is used to customize the trigger position
left.description_zh: 同 css left，用于自定义触发器位置

right.description: Same as css right, which is used to customize the trigger position
right.description_zh: 同 css right，用于自定义触发器位置

safe-area.description: Whether to enable the bottom safe zone adaptation
safe-area.description_zh: 是否开启底部安全区适配

teleport.description: The element on which the component is mounted

elevation.description: Altitude, with selectable values of 'true', 'false', and '0-24'
elevation.description_zh: 海拔高度，可选值为 `true`、`false` 和 `0-24` 的等级

events.name: click
events.description: Triggers when the trigger is clicked, not when the 'disabled' state is 'true'
events.description_zh: 点击触发器时触发，在 `disabled` 状态为 `true` 时不触发

events.name: open
events.description: Triggers when the action menu is activated and opened
events.description_zh: 在激活并打开动作菜单时触发

events.name: opened
events.description: Triggers at the end of an animation that activates and opens the action menu
events.description_zh: 在激活并打开动作菜单的动画结束时触发

events.name: close
events.description: Triggers when deactivating and closing the action menu
events.description_zh: 在失活并关闭动作菜单时触发

events.name: closed
events.description: Triggers at the end of an animation that deactivates and closes the action menu
events.description_zh: 在失活并关闭动作菜单的动画结束时触发
